name: ace-css
description: Full-featured Basscss package for web apps

scripts.build: npm run start && npm run minify
scripts.start: mkdir -p css && postcss index.css -u postcss-import postcss-custom-media postcss-custom-properties postcss-calc postcss-color-function postcss-remove-root autoprefixer --no-map -o css/ace.css
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.docs: npm run docs:data && npm run docs:build

author: Brent Jackson
